publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5982Gil Paterson:Congratulations to Milngavie Primary School—That the Parliament congratulates the staff and pupils of Milngavie Primary School on winning the East Dunbartonshire heat of the Euroquiz competition that took place this week; further congratulates all teams who competed in the heat for the high level of competition and enthusiasm displayed throughout, and wishes Milngavie Primary the very best of luck in the final, which takes place on Monday 10 May in the Scottish Parliament. Supported by: Ross Finnie*, Alasdair Allan*, Stuart McMillan*, Stewart Maxwell*, Aileen Campbell*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-5982 Congratulations to Milngavie Primary School (lodged on 17 March 2010) Rob Gibson*, Sandra White*, Bill Wilson*, Des McNulty*, Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-5982 Gil Paterson: Congratulations to Milngavie Primary School—That the Parliament congratulates the staff and pupils of Milngavie Primary School on winning the East Dunbartonshire heat of the Euroquiz competition that took place this week; further congratulates all teams who competed in the heat for the high level of competition and enthusiasm displayed throughout, and wishes Milngavie Primary the very best of luck in the final, which takes place on Monday 10 May in the Scottish Parliament. Supported by: Ross Finnie, Alasdair Allan, Stuart McMillan, Stewart Maxwell, Aileen Campbell, Bill Kidd, Rob Gibson, Sandra White, Bill Wilson, Des McNulty, Jamie Hepburn
